attributes.action: Free public transport for NHS workers going to work and free staff parking
attributes.additional_details: During this time where the world has come to a hault we should show gratitude to tne nhs workers not just now during this pandemic but permanently
attributes.background: Make travel free for all NHS workers who travel by public transport on their way to work

rejection.details:
